This function reads from a text file where a list of serialized objects is stored.

removeMenuItem(Item) - Method in class Business.ItemManager
This function removes an item.

This function ask the user to select an item from a list of items he/she wishes to delete.
removeOrderedItem(OrderedItem) - Method in class Business.OrderedItemManager
This function removes the ordered item
removeOrderedItem(OrderedItem) - Method in class Data.Order
Remove an ordered item from the list of ordered items that belongs to this order.
removeOrderedItem() - Static method in class Presentation.OrderUI
This function display a list of orders for the user to select from, then displays a list of ordered items belonging to that order for the user to remove it from the order.
removeOrderedPackage(OrderedPackage) - Method in class Business.OrderedPackageManager
This function removes the ordered package
removeOrderedPackage(OrderedPackage) - Method in class Data.Order
Remove an ordered promotional package from the list of ordered items that belongs to this order.
removeOrderedPromotionalPackage() - Static method in class Presentation.OrderUI
This function display a list of orders for the user to select from, then displays a list of ordered promotional package belonging to that order for the user to remove it from the order.
removePackage(PromotionalPackage) - Method in class Business.PackageManager
This function removes an promotional package.
removePackage() - Static method in class Presentation.PromotionalPackageUI
This function ask the user to select a promotional package from a list of promotional packages he/she wishes to delete.
removePackageItem(PackageItem) - Method in class Data.PromotionalPackage
This function removes a package item from the listOfPackageItem and set the package item to not belong to this promotional package.
removeReservation() - Static method in class Presentation.ReservationUI
This function display a list of reservation for the user to select from to manually remove a reservation.
removeReservationBooking(Reservation) - Method in class Business.ReservationManager
This function removes the reservation and update the table accordingly to release it for reservation.
Reservation - Class in Data
This class implements the Reservation entity with the attributes id, startDateTime, table, numberOfPax, customer.
Reservation() - Constructor for class Data.Reservation
Default constructor.
RESERVATION_EXPIRES_IN_MINUTES - Static variable in class Presentation.RRPSS
The restaurant maximum time allowance for the customer to be late for a reservation in minutes.

This class implements the Reservation Data Access Object with the attributes fileName, fileNameForRunningID.
